articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Landing and Anti-landing Drills of KPA Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Landing and Anti-landing Drills of KPA Units
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on Monday guided the landing and anti-landing drills of KPA Large Combined Units 324 and 287 and KPA Navy Combined Unit 597. 
					He issued an order for drills without any notice and finally examined the landing and anti-landing capabilities of the large combined units of the KPA Ground Force and the KPA Navy combined unit situated in the eastern sector of the front and the east coastal area. 
					
					After receiving a report on the plan of the drills, he gave an order to start the drills. 
					
					First the drill of striking and wiping out landing enemies in the waters took place. 
					
					Multiple launch rocket systems opened fire all at once. 
					
					He was greatly satisfied with the drill. He said "It was well done", adding that the units made intensive firing at the group of enemy warships after setting a correct time for firing on the basis of the full grasp of the enemy's landing plan and when the rate of destroying enemy ships was considered as the highest. 
					
					He stressed the need to destroy the enemies in waters to the last man through strong firepower so that they might not land in the coast of the territory.
					
					He ordered the soldiers of the heroic KPA to display their mettle in the great war against the enemies and send all of them to the bottom of the sea as they run wild like wolves threatened with fire. 
					
					Then the landing operation of KPA Navy Unit 597 started. 
					
					High-speed boats charged into the coast in succession.
					
					Watching through field glasses combatants occupying enemy positions at a breath, he said they look highly-spirited and if it were an actual battle, the enemies would have no time to come to their senses.
					
					He called the women soldiers of the 3rd artillery piece of the 1st Platoon of a battery under KPA Large Combined Unit 324 who had been involved in the artillery firing at the landing enemies to come close to him. He personally designated a firepower position beside him and set a target without any notice before giving an order to destroy it. 
					
					Upon receiving the order, members of the women's multiple rocket system rapidly took the firepower position and accurately hit the target. 
					
					He shook their hands one by one, praising them as great soldiers and crack shots. They performed their duties well though he had set without any notice a target which was not envisaged in the drill program and assigned to them duty to destroy it, he said. He took them to his arms before having a photo taken with them. 
					
					"How praiseworthy Korean women are and a-match-for-a-hundred members of the women's multiple rocket system can never be compared with nukes", he noted, earnestly telling them to conduct training better and launch a dynamic campaign to become one-beats- a hundred crack shots at ordinary times and hero artillery women by sending enemy warships to the bottom of the sea in the decisive battles. 
					
					He was accompanied by Hyon Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon and Rim Kwang Il.

articles.title: Greetings to Greek President
articles.content:
Greetings to Greek President
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Carlos Papoulias, president of Greece, on its national day.
					The message wished the Greek people well-being and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Acting President of Bangladesh
articles.content:
Greetings to Acting President of Bangladesh
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Abdul Hamid, acting president of Bangladesh, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
					The message wished the acting president greater success in the work for the country's prosperity, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow strong in various fields.

articles.title: Greetings to Bangladeshi PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Bangladeshi PM
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Sunday sent a message of greeting to Sheikh Hasina, prime minister of Bangladesh, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
					The message expressed conviction that the friendly relations between the two countries would steadily develop, wishing her success in her work for the economic development of the country and the well-being of the people.

articles.title: German VIPs Here
articles.content:
German VIPs Here
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Manfred Grund, secretary general of the Group of the Christian Democratic Union-Christian Union of German Bundestag, arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Wooden Box and Glass Cups, Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Indian
articles.content:
Wooden Box and Glass Cups, Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Indian
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The exhibits at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK include a wooden box and a set of glass cups, presented to leader Kim Jong Il by Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, in February Juche 88 (1999).
					The wooden box for valuables is decorated with stripped patterns in black, red and blue colors and inscribed with pictures of Gods symbolic of happiness and longevity. The light blue color glass cups are decorated in their lower parts with silver-gilt iron belt patterned with flowers.
					
					The gifts represent Vishwanath's profound reverence for Kim Jong Il, who developed in depth the Juche idea created by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					As an ardent adherent of the Juche idea, he has devoted his all to the study and dissemination of it.
					
					He formed the Society for the Study of Juche Idea of India and attended international seminars on the Juche idea, at which he played a big role in proving the uniqueness, scientific accuracy and truthfulness of the idea.
					
					He visited the DPRK many times. He was honored with the audience of Kim Jong Il and enjoyed deep loving care from him.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Nampho Port on Monday to support the Korean people in their struggle for preventing a war and defending peace.
					Priority to the meeting, they laid bunches of flowers before a statue of President Kim Il Sung in Nampho City and paid tribute to him.
					
					Present there were captains and crewmen of a Chinese-flagged ship and two Cambodian-flagged ship.
					
					The speakers at the meeting said that a grave situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the joint military exercises being waged under the baton of the U.S.
					
					The DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and third nuclear test cannot be called into question, they noted.
					
					They extended firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation despite the moves of the provocateurs to stifle them.
					
					The speakers hoped that the Korean people full of conviction of a victory with boundless loyalty to their leader would achieve greater successes in realizing the cause of justice.
					
					A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: World TB Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World TB Day Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- An event took place held here to mark World Tuberculosis Day on Monday.
					Present there were health workers of the Ministry of Public Health and in the city, representatives and staff members of the WHO and the UNICEF here.
					
					Speakers called for paying public attention to preventing tuberculosis to suit the theme "Stop TB in Southeast Asia-Zero Death to Zero Infection!" set forth by the WHO this year.
					
					The participants looked round photos on display.
					
					They also visited Hospital No. 3 under the Ministry of Public Health.
					
					Hygienic information campaign was held in Pyongyang and provinces on the same day to mark the day.

articles.title: Exhibition Gives DPRK People Confidence in Fast Development of Nation's Light Industry
articles.content:
Exhibition Gives DPRK People Confidence in Fast Development of Nation's Light Industry
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of consumer goods now under way at the Three-Revolution Exhibition here has drawn many visitors every day, giving them big hope for rapid development of the country's light industry.
					On display there are more than 142 000 items of consumer goods, presented by factories and cooperatives in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					According to an official concerned, the exhibition is the biggest of its kind ever in the country in size and the highest in level.
					
					In particular, wheat cakes stuffed with meat, varieties of bread and processed meat and confectionery, produced at factories under the General Bureau of Public Service and the Pyongyang Foodstuff Complex, give a glimpse of the rapid development of the nation's foodstuff industry.
					
					What caught the eyes is corn syrup produced by the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory in a localized ferment process which makes it possible to operate the factory at full capacity.
					
					Choe Hak Chol, a section chief of the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry, told KCNA:
					
					"The exhibition shows that it is possible to put foodstuff production on a normal basis when foodstuff factories tap its potentials to the maximum and step up the updating of production processes."
					
					Various kinds of quality sports footwear are on display at the exhibition, which will be conducive to fanning up sports enthusiasm across the country.
					
					Kinds of insam products made by the Kaesong Roksan Exports Processing Factory are highly appreciated by the visitors.
					
					Sim Myong Hui, a section chief of the factory, said:
					
					"My factory will turn out various kinds of more quality products to be symbolic of the factory."
					
					Conspicuous are also the exhibits from foodstuff factories in localities, including Changsong County, North Phyongan Province.
					
					Sung Kyong Hui, a section chief of the Knitting Industry Management Bureau under the Ministry of Light Industry, said:
					
					"The exhibition gives us firm belief that it is a matter of time for the DPRK to stand at the world's advanced level in light industry."

articles.title: Ri Sung Ik, Merited Medical Man of DPRK
articles.content:
Ri Sung Ik, Merited Medical Man of DPRK
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Ri Sung Ik, director of the Virus Research Institute at Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University, is a meritorious medical man who made a big contribution to developing the nation's preventive medicine.
					Early in his youth, he succeeded in developing an anti-polio medicine with locally available raw materials, which was introduced throughout the country to root out the cause of poliovirus disease.
					
					Over the past 50 years, he has developed many kinds of vaccines, including bird flu vaccine and influenza incrassation vaccine.
					
					In recent years, he invented a new method of tissue culture based on domestic materials and settled technical problems in establishing a new vaccine production process. The vaccines, mass-produced by this method, are well received by users as they are of high economic value and efficacious in treatment without giving adverse effect on human body.
					
					Prof. and Dr. Ri is a winner of the title of DPRK Labor Hero and a candidate academician.

articles.title: Spring Herbs Good for Health
articles.content:
Spring Herbs Good for Health
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- From long ago, the Korean people have used for dishes spring herbs, including wild onion, shepherd's purse, aralia shoots, wormwood and aster.
					With various kinds of vitamins, protein and minerals, those herbs are considered to be good for health.
					
					Wild onion helps cure women's diseases and improve men's energy. Alcohol mixed with dried wild onion is also helpful to the treatment of nerve disease.
					
					Shepherd's purse is efficacious for relieving fatigue in spring and Aralia shoots for lowering sugar content in blood.
					
					Wormwood contains inorganic matters and vitamins good for neuralgia and stanching. Taking 80 grams of it each day is enough to supply vitamin A needed for human body a day. 
					
					Taking aster for certain days is good for patients with chronic lung disorder.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on U.S. Moves to Undermine Truth of DPRK's Possession of Nukes
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on U.S. Moves to Undermine Truth of DPRK's Possession of Nukes
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The United States is resorting to the whole gamut of intrigues to distort the truth of the present situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					The U.S. blustered that the war drills being staged by it together with the south Korean puppet forces and armed forces of satellite countries with the involvement of nuclear war means are aimed to prevent the situation on the peninsula from aggravating due to the "nuclear and missile provocations by the north".
					
					Against this backdrop, the U.S. high-ranking authorities let loose a spate of vituperation that the north's development of nukes and missiles is a wrong action and the U.S. is open to sincere negotiations if the north makes a good option.
					
					This is no more than sophism to justify its vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK. This is little short of senseless rhetoric to shift the responsibility for the present situation on to the DPRK and escalate the atmosphere for slapping the DPRK with sanctions and pressure.
					
					As mentioned earlier, the DPRK's nuclear weapons serve as a just and treasured sword for defending the country's sovereignty and security. This was prompted by a historical lesson drawn from the confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					It is the invariable policy of the U.S. to seize the peninsula, an important political and military and geographical vantage point in the Asia-Pacific region and realize its ambition for dominating the world.
					
					For this purpose, the U.S. has regarded the DPRK, that has stood on the forefront for peace against imperialism and for socialism, as a thorn in its flesh for nearly seven decades since it illegally occupied south Korea in September 1945, and persistently committed moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					Most conspicuous in the U.S. moves in carrying out its policy toward the DPRK is that it considered nuclear weapons as a basic means for stifling the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. has so far invariably relied on nuclear weapons in shaping its policy toward the DPRK whether it opted for confrontation or dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. constant nuclear blackmail and war policy forced the DPRK to draw a final conclusion that it has to access powerful nuclear deterrent, physical means for defending the country's sovereignty and the nation's supreme interests. 
					
					The DPRK's nuclear armed forces serve as a means for a just war for terminating the U.S. persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK and removing the danger of a nuclear war forever.
					
					The DPRK's option will remain unchanged as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy toward it and the strongholds of aggression targeting it exist on earth.
					
					It is ridiculous for the U.S. to talk about approval and recognition over the DPRK's nuclear possession which was the exercise of its sovereignty and a measure for self-defence. 
					
					What's more, it has gone so mean as to describe those measures as a thing in return for economic aid and a bargaining chip for dialogue, prompted by its money-is-everything way of thinking. 
					
					The U.S. should clearly understand that sophism and allurement can neither undermine the truth of the DPRK's possession of nukes for self-defense nor discuss unilateral abandonment.
					
					The U.S. desperate employment of poor tricks will only disclose its policy toward the DPRK caught in the crossfire and the plight of present U.S. administration which is driven to the wall.
					
					The DPRK has no intent to have dialogue with the U.S. which is pursuing the policy of nuclear blackmail but will follow the road of Songun, its option, without any vacillation.

articles.title: U.S. Reckless Nuclear Blackmail Will Only Precipitate Its Self-Destruction: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Reckless Nuclear Blackmail Will Only Precipitate Its Self-Destruction: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, U.S. Deputy Defense Secretary Carter flew into south Korea to be closeted with its puppet officials against the backdrop of the U.S. and south Korea's escalating moves for a war against the DPRK.
					He met with those concerned of the Chongwadae and defence and foreign ministers of south Korea and gave them assurances that the U.S. would soon round off the "tailored deterrence strategy" for mounting a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK.
					
					He even disclosed the plan of nuclear capable B-52 to stage a drill of dropping A-bombs in the air over the Korean Peninsula, zealously prodding the puppet forces into provocations.
					
					U.S. nuclear-powered submarines entered waters off the peninsula under the pretext of the Foal Eagle joint military exercises. Next day B-52 flew into south Korea to stage a drill under the simulated conditions of an actual battle.
					
					This goes to clearly prove once again that the on-going joint military exercises of the U.S. and the puppet forces are not "annual ones for defence" but the DPRK-targeted nuclear war drills from A to Z.
					
					Their madcap war maneuvers in the sky, land and seas of south Korea are driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					The facts prove that the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons as a nuclear deterrent for self-defence was an entirely right decision to cope with the U.S. ceaseless nuclear war blackmail.
					
					The U.S. and its allies are resorting to all sorts of "sanctions" and pressure rackets to play down the significance of the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons in defending the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the region. This is nothing but a criminal act of turning black into white.
					
					No matter how desperately the hostile forces twist the situation and intensify their offensive to stifle the DPRK, they will find no change in the stand of the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks its strategic bomber and nuclear submarine can browbeat the DPRK.
					
					This may be a shot in arm of the puppet forces as they left all political, military, economic and cultural arteries to the tender mercy of their U.S. master and put them under the protection by his "nuclear umbrella" but this sounds to the DPRK nothing but a mere bravado.
					
					Nuclear weapons are no longer a monopoly of the U.S. and gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with its A-bombs.
					
					The war-like forces should bear in mind that the strongholds of aggression, to say nothing of B-52 or nuclear submarine and other U.S. means for nuclear blackmail, can never get rid of the range of sighting strike of the DPRK's nuclear forces for self-defence.
					
					The U.S. had better ponder over its miserable end before talking about "nuclear umbrella" and "defence commitment" for the puppet forces.
					
					Provocateurs are bound to meet a miserable end in the nuclear war ignited by themselves.

articles.title: AA Nullification Is Bold Decision to Terminate State of War on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Report
articles.content:
AA Nullification Is Bold Decision to Terminate State of War on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Report
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency (KCNA) released a report on March 24, clarifying the justice of the decision for nullifying the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA).
					The first of the three-part report said as follows:
					
					The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army announced that it would totally nullify AA at the most crucial time when the nation is in fierce confrontation with the U.S., staking the destiny of the country and the nation. This was a just counteraction for self-defence to cope with the evermore undisguised U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK, and a historic and bold decision to push forward the efforts for the country's reunification and regional peace and stability.
					
					The U.S. has abused AA as the leverage for pursuing its hostile policy toward the DPRK for nearly six decades. Its criminal acts turned the Korean Peninsula into the biggest hotspot in the world and a theater where a war may break out any moment.
					
					The U.S. in collusion with hostile forces made up of riff-raffs has posed serious threats to the DPRK's sovereignty through the persistent and vicious military blackmail and economic blockade.
					
					The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces were the actual nuclear war rehearsals that activated nuclear strike means including B-52 capable of carrying nuclear warheads and nuclear-armed submarine.
					
					This is a brazen-faced violation and encroachment on AA and all the north-south agreements and an unpardonable provocation and infringement on the DPRK's sovereignty and supreme interests.  
					
					The unprecedentedly acute and serious state of political and military emergency prevailing on the Korean Peninsula urged the DPRK to terminate at an early date the geopolitical disaster, neither a war nor peace, which has lasted century after century on this land, and take a bold decision to guarantee the national sovereignty and regional stability.
					
					1
					
					The decision to nullify AA was a countermeasure for self-defense taken by the DPRK as it felt no need to be bound to the agreement which exists in form only owing to the U.S.
					
					It is illogical for the hostile forces including the U.S. to build up the public opinion critical of the DPRK's "violation" over its toughest countermeasure while asserting that "AA can not be unilaterally dissolved as it was agreed and signed with mutual agreement".
					
					AA is not one that requires bilateral agreement to be rendered invalid and it will be naturally nullified if one side does not abide by it.
					
					AA has long been invalid due to the systematic scrapping of it by the U.S. and the unreasonable behavior of the UN Security Council that backed the U.S. moves for the last six decades.
					
					When AA was concluded on July 27, 1953, at the end of the 500 odd-day heated talks, the attention and expectation of all the Korean people and peace-loving people of the world focused on its paragraph 60.
					
					The implementation of paragraph 60 was a key issue in realizing the country's reunification and contributing to the Asian and global peace as it called for withdrawing all foreign troops from Korea, removing the root cause of a war and solving the Korean problem peacefully.
					
					Nevertheless, the U.S. signed the "mutual defense treaty" with south Korea according to its already worked-out scenario on August 8, 1953, when the ink on the deal was barely dry, and legalized its military presence in south Korea. Therefore, it nullified paragraph 60 on the removal of all foreign armed forces.
					
					Paragraph 13 d of AA banned the introduction of operational planes, armed vehicles, weapons and munitions from outside Korea. 
					
					The U.S. unilaterally declared the abrogation of paragraph 13 d of AA on June 21, 1957 and systemically introduced huge modern military hardware and over 1,000 nuclear weapons of different kinds into south Korea. As a result, south Korea has turned into the biggest nuclear outpost and nuclear arsenal in the Far East.
					
					The U.S. deliberately repealed or violated the paragraphs of AA that stand in the way of its preparations for a new war in Korea and destroyed all the mechanisms overseeing the implementation of AA.
					
					The U.S. serious breach of AA rendered defunct sentences related to the Military Armistice Commission i.e. from points 19 to 35 of paragraph 2 as well as those related to the Neutral Nations Supervisory Commission i.e. from points 36 to 50 of the same paragraph.
					
					The U.S. has made ceaseless military provocations against the DPRK free from any legal and institutional restrictions and binding force.
					
					This is evidenced by the fact that the cases of violation of AA totaled hundreds of thousands entailing hundreds of meetings of the Military Armistice Commission.
					
					AA was able to exist though in form thanks to the DPRK's exercise of utmost self-restraint and patience.
					
					The DPRK advanced lots of proposals for ending the state of armistice and setting up mechanism for ensuring durable peace on the Korean Peninsula. They included the one for concluding a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. (in the 1970s), the one for holding tripartite talks including south Korea in the DPRK-U.S. talks (in the 1980s), the one for setting up new mechanism of ensuring peace (in the 1990s), the one for pushing for the issue of declaring the end of war at the talks of the countries concerned in AA (the Declaration for Development of North-South Relations, Peace and Prosperity on Oct. 4 in 2007) and the one for promptly starting the talks to replace AA with a peace treaty on the 60th anniversary of the start of the Korean war (the statement of the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Jan. 11 in 2010).
					
					The U.S., however, ignored and turned down all these proposals.
					
					It has never abided by AA but pursued a war, not peace.
					
					It was absolutely unacceptable for the DPRK in the light of the supreme interests of the sovereign state to remain bound to the perfunctory document thrown away like a pair of old shoes by the other belligerent party.
					
					A war breaks out unexpectedly.
					
					The DPRK was compelled to take a substantial countermeasure of nullifying AA to defend the security of the country and the gains of the revolution and secure the sovereignty of the Korean nation in the face of the U.S. threat of aggression getting more outrageous not restrained by AA.

articles.title: Nothing Can Cover up U.S. Criminal Nature: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nothing Can Cover up U.S. Criminal Nature: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean authorities' loud talk about "threat from the north" is a dangerous ploy to evade their crime of causing the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and justify their moves to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article.
					
					After turning south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East to invade the DPRK, the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are getting hell-bent on their moves to launch a new war and bringing the greater nuclear disaster to the Korean Peninsula, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					Those, who are seriously threatening the peace on the peninsula and the security of the nation while brandishing a nuclear stick, are terming the DPRK a "nuclear criminal" to mislead the public. This can never work on the present world.
					
					The U.S. is a criminal entirely to blame for harassing peace and increasing the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula as it adopted the preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK as its policy and perpetrated nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					If the U.S. had not occupied south Korea militarily and kicked up nuclear war racket against the DPRK, neither nuclear issue nor crisis would have occurred.
					
					The U.S. has intensified DPRK-targeted nuclear war moves for decades with south Korea as its military base for the purpose of making the Korean Peninsula as a bridgehead for carrying out its strategy for Asian domination.
					
					No one can know when the dark clouds of a nuclear war hanging over the peninsula turn into a nuclear disaster for the Korean nation.
					
					It is none other than the U.S. that introduced nuclear weapons into the peninsula and seriously threatened the DPRK while openly revealing its attempt for a preemptive nuclear attack on the latter. With nothing can the U.S. cover up its nature as a criminal creating the extreme danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula and destroying regional peace and security.

articles.title: National Reconciliation, Peace Called for
articles.content:
National Reconciliation, Peace Called for
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Seoul on March 15 at which it published this year's action program.
					It said it would conduct positive activities and strengthen solidarity with organizations comprising people of different social standings in order to achieve the national reconciliation and cooperation and the peace on the Korean Peninsula and improve the south-north relations.
					
					Ri Chang Bok, director general of the 70 Million Korean People's Meeting for Embracing National Reunification, was elected permanent representative of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration at the meeting.

articles.title: U.S. Pays High Price for Wars of Aggression: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Pays High Price for Wars of Aggression: News Analyst
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is paying a high price for its wars of aggression in different parts of the world.
					The federal government began sequester in March amid great social concern and uneasiness.
					
					According to it, 85 billion dollars of the budget will be cut in the present fiscal year which ends in September and a total of 1.2 trillion dollars will be slashed in 10 years to come.
					
					The introduction of the sequester indicates that the economic crisis has become so serious in the U.S. that it is hard to tide over.
					
					A drastic cut in spending for all fields including government organs, national defense and economy has thrown American society into a pandemonium.
					
					President Obama deplored that sequester would deprive many Americans of jobs and push the economy to depression again.
					
					An international credit company hinted that sequester might force the federal government to close.
					
					It is unanimous public outcry that the U.S. ruling quarters hell-bent on moves for wars of aggression are chiefly to blame for driving the country into bankruptcy, not content with causing an economic crisis.
					
					According to information made public a decade since the U.S. invasion of Iraq, its ruling quarters spent at least 2 trillion dollars for the Iraqi war.
					
					Besides this, a total of 3.7 trillion dollars was spent by the U.S. for "anti-terror war" in Afghanistan, Pakistan, etc.
					
					The U.S. is obliged to pay a stupendous amount of debt as it issued a ridiculous amount of national bonds every year. It is saddled with more than 16 trillion dollars of national debt, becoming the world's biggest debtor nation.
					
					A stopgap measure taken by the U.S. Administration to weather the crisis is to impose more taxes on the citizens and massively fire workers.
					
					Consequently, one of every three families of paid workers is under the poverty line and streets are crowded with 12.5 million unemployed.
					
					They shouted such slogans as "Job, not war", "Toiling people are tired of paying for crisis" and "No war against toiling people."
					
					Shouts of these slogans heard from Wall Street demos across the U.S. are an eruption of their resentment against the reactionary ruling quarters keen for world domination, far from taking any measures for the guarantee of elementary right to existence.
					
					The U.S. should have rolled back its policy of war of aggression and taken measures to settle its serious economic issue and the issue of people's living.
					
					However, the U.S. warmongers are still getting frantic with their moves to provoke a new war, seized with their anachronistic ambition for world domination.
					
					Those who are fond of playing with fire are bound to perish therein.
					
					The U.S. should clearly understand that its persistent reckless war policy would precipitate its own destruction.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear-armed Submarine's Entry to S. Korean Port Censured
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear-armed Submarine's Entry to S. Korean Port Censured
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity of Pusan in south Korea staged an emergency action on March 21 in protest against the entry of the U.S. nuclear-armed submarine into Pusan Port.
					The participants thronged outside the base of the navy operational command in Pusan, shouting "U.S. nuclear-armed submarine, leave at once." Now lying at anchor in Pusan is the nuclear-powered submarine under the U.S. 7th fleet. The submarine was mobilized in a combined naval mobile drill, part of the Foal Eagle joint military exercise.
					
					The protesters shouted they are Pusan citizens wanting peace against war. Absolutely intolerable is the entry of the nuclear submarine amid the present touch-and-go situation, they added.
					
					They denounced the U.S. for moving to finally start a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					They held a meeting after 4-hour protest.
					
					The speakers condemned the U.S. for letting its nuclear-armed submarine enter the port instead of stopping the military exercises and holding discussion on dialogues under the situation where a war may break out any moment.
					
					They denounced the entry, asking for whom and with whose permission the submarine entered, adding that the north has already put the U.S. nuclear submarine in its target list.
					
					They urged the U.S. to immediately take back the nuclear submarine, not doing such a reckless war gamble as holding the people on this land hoping for peace against war as hostages.
					
					They said they would wage the indefinite emergency action until the U.S. forces pull out of south Korea, adding that they could not leave Pusan as long as the nuclear-armed submarine is there.

articles.title: Suppression of Progressive Forces under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Progressive Forces under Fire in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities have renewed the coloring offensive to suppress the progressive forces.
					The intelligence authorities opened to public on Mar. 20 the absurd analysis to the effect that the south Korean "forces following the north" posted articles released by the north on websites at the instruction of the north.
					
					They claimed that some public organizations have held the same assertion as the north that "the Jeju naval base is the outpost of the U.S. and the Free Trade Agreement is the worst country-selling agreement agreed by the president and officials of the field of trade of south Korea."
					
					They also said the articles dealing with the Yonphyong Island shelling case, project for four big rivers and the UN resolution on "sanctions" against the DPRK had "common factors with north's assertion."
					
					It is a fact known to the world that they admitted themselves that the Jeju naval base is an outpost base serving the U.S.
					
					The south Korean naval forces wrote in the "survey and experimental report on the construction of the Jeju naval base" in April of 2010 that they carried  out the task to examine the security and suitability of the project for the operation of 150,000-tonnage passenger ship and a nuclear-powered aircraft carrier according to the project program".
					
					The analysis of the assertion regarding the U.S.-south Korea FTA is nothing different from this.
					
					They pushed for in secrecy the negotiations for the conclusion of FTA at the trade ministerial meeting with the U.S. during the Lee Myung Bak regime and finally signed the documents containing the results of additional negotiations without ratification by the "National Assembly". After the negotiations for FTA, the chief negotiator from the then Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade gave assurances that south Korea would open its rice market to the U.S. and expand it.
					
					These facts still send the south Koreans into a great fury.
					
					The puppet forces even reviled the public opinions critical of Yonphyong Island shelling case, the project of four big rivers and other matters of serious concern.
					
					They had better behave themselves, mindful that they will face the unanimous denunciation and punishment by the nation for their coloring offensive.

articles.title: GI Crimes in South Korea Blasted
articles.content:
GI Crimes in South Korea Blasted
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes issued the following statement on Monday:
					The entire Korean nation is enraged by the brutal crimes by the gangster-like U.S. troops in south Korea in unbroken chain. 
					
					Crimes committed by GIs in recent days alone are lashing south Koreans into fury. GIs went on shooting spree against pedestrians in the heart of Seoul during their DPRK-targeted war drills. Other GIs leaped upon a car driver and a restaurant owner, threatening them with lethal weapons. Another group of GIs teased women in a lift of an apartment building and on the subway car.
					
					Infuriated by GIs' crimes, people of various circles in south Korea are shouting slogan "Let's drive the U.S. forces, perpetrators of all sorts of evils and crimes, out of this land as soon as possible".
					
					Brass hats of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea are letting loose such rhetoric as "apology" or "measure" in a bid to calm down the south Koreans' resistance.
					
					These atrocities are a vivid manifestation of extreme arrogance of the occupation forces which regard south Korea as their colony and its people for a plaything, brutal nature of the cannibals' group and the shameless way of thinking of the colonial ruler. 
					
					Looking back on history, GIs' robbery, murder, rape and violence were daily occurrence for the last several decades since their landing in south Korea. These crimes have brought untold sufferings and pain to the south Koreans.
					
					The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces have run the whole gamut of crimes in south Korea, stunning its people and other people of the world. They include massacre of civilians on Jeju Island and in Rogun-ri, an incident in which GIs forced haircut on a woman in Tongduchon and killing of Yun Kum I, Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son recorded in history. These crimes bring into broad daylight the brutal, cruel and high-handed nature of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces. 
					
					What is more hateful is that they are working with bloodshot eyes to ignite a nuclear war in a bid to reduce the whole territory of Korea to ashes and exterminate the entire Korean nation, not content with perpetrating such hair-raising atrocities.
					
					The U.S. stages every year madcap war maneuvers to invade the DPRK with huge nuclear strike means including nuclear strategic bomber, nuclear-powered submarine and carrier involved under the signboard of "provision of nuclear umbrella" to south Korea.
					
					 B-52's frantic drill for dropping A-bombs staged in the air over south Korea during the Key Resolve war exercises clearly proves that the south Korean people are exposed to an extreme danger of nuclear disaster, to say nothing of GIs' ceaseless violence.
					
					"Protection of a friendly nation" and "provision of nuclear umbrella" touted by American brutes obsessed with extreme phobia about Koreans are nothing but sheer sophism to justify their plunder, killing, aggression and war.
					
					This being a hard reality, the poor-spirited puppet group of traitors in south Korea is crying out for "a closer alliance" like a monk chanting prayer. While acting as a shock force in the moves of its master for a war of aggression, the group is running amuck to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and intensify the suppression of pro-reunification patriotic forces, keeping mum about crimes of GIs.
					
					The puppet group is making a far-fetched assertion that the north's nuclear deterrence for self-defence aimed to defend the nation and protect the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula is dangerous, while trying hard to keep itself under "safe umbrella" of U.S. nuclear weapons  though they are designed to bring a nuclear disaster to all compatriots. Such disgraceful behavior of the group betrays its wretched plight as colonial stooges.
					
					The GIs' crimes will never come to an end through a mere revision of the U.S.-south Korea "Status of Forces Agreement."
					
					The south Korean people will never be in peace as long as the U.S. imperialists are allowed to go on rampage in south Korea.
					
					They should put an end to the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' presence, the root cause of all sorts of misfortune and disaster, at an early date and dynamically turn out in a nationwide sacred war for wiping out the pro-U.S. group of sycophants and traitors to the last man.

articles.title: All Koreans Are Out in Struggle for Peace against War: Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
All Koreans Are Out in Struggle for Peace against War: Chongryon Officials
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Officials of organizations under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan issued statements on Mar. 23 in support of "An Appeal to All Korean Nation" released by the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK).
					Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, said that the appeal made by the DFRK Central Committee heightened enthusiasm and patriotism of workers in commerce in Japan as it called for turning out in an all-out action for defending the nation's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					The patriotic war for reunification to defend the nation's dignity and sovereignty is a just struggle to defend the community of Koreans in Japan, he said, adding that all the workers in commerce in Japan will turn out in the all-out nationwide patriotic sacred war to resolutely shatter the U.S. and its satellite forces' racket for a war of aggression.
					
					Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, pointed out that a touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula was created as the U.S. took issue with the DPRK's satellite launch in disregard of the legitimate right to satellite launch specified in international law and prodded the UN Security Council into slapping the DPRK with tightened "sanctions".
					
					The on-going all-out action is a showdown between the entire Korean nation in their efforts to defend its dignity and sovereignty and the U.S., he said.
					
					All Koreans are now out in the struggle for peace against war in order to reduce the tension on the Korean Peninsula, he concluded.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Ukraine
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Ukraine
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- An Ukrainian preparatory committee was formed in Kiev on March 19 to celebrate President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary.
					Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					The committee decided to widely introduce and disseminate immortal feats of Kim Il Sung and hold colorful events including seminar on the Juche idea and Songun politics, film show and photo exhibition to mark the anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Liberator of Korean Nation: Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Liberator of Korean Nation: Bangladeshi Organization
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy issued a bulletin titled "Liberator of Korean Nation" on March 19 to mark President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary.
					The bulletin said:
					
					Kim Il Sung left his homeland when he was fourteen resolving never to return before he took back the country from the Japanese imperialists.
					
					He organized the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) in 1926 with young revolutionaries as its members.
					
					The formation of the DIU whose mission was to overthrow the Japanese imperialists and achieve the country's liberation and independence served as a starting point of the Korean revolution.
					
					The struggle of the Korean people could dynamically advance relying on their own armed forces since he founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army on April 25, 1932.
					
					He led the 15-year-long war against the Japanese imperialists to victory, finally liberating Korea on August 15, 1945.

articles.title: DPRK's Stance Supported by Personage of DR Congo
articles.content:
DPRK's Stance Supported by Personage of DR Congo
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo on March 14 made public a statement in support of the statement  issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army. 
					Now the tense situation where a war may break out any moment prevails on the Korean Peninsula due to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S., the statement said, and went on:
					
					What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. is going to ignite a nuclear war in Korea by mobilizing the super-large nuclear carrier and other warships and huge military troops. 
					
					I call upon the world progressive political parties and peace-loving people to bitterly denounce the U.S. and its allies for their grave provocations for aggression and extend support and solidarity to the heroic Korean people all out in the standoff with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					The U.S. should clearly know that the DPRK has strengthened the invincible military capability while meeting all challenges of the imperialists with the great Juche idea and Songun politics. 
					
					We believe that invincible socialist Korea with the capacity of manufacturing and launching satellites will never pardon the military provocations of the U.S. imperialists but surely reunify the country as it possesses latest technology and diversified nuclear deterrence. 
					
					The final victory is in store for the Korean people under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Policy to Stifle DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Policy to Stifle DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Czech newspaper Halo Noviny on Mar. 14 carried a commentary titled "U.S. policy to stifle DPRK". 
					The commentary written by an American news analyst said that the U.S. always needs enemy and makes enemy, if it has not.
					
					The DPRK is the first target of the U.S., the commentary said, adding that the U.S. policy is to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					The Bush administration insulted the DPRK by listing it as a member of the "axis of evil" and the present U.S. administration has carried forward the worst things out of the Bush administration's policy, it noted, adding:
					
					The DPRK is the only country which was slapped with "sanctions" for its satellite launch.
					
					Its satellite launch was legitimate. 
					
					The "NPT, threat to peace and security" was cited as the reason of "sanctions" against the DPRK. However, no other country has threatened global peace more than the U.S. 
					
					The U.S. pursues the policy of a preemptive nuclear attack and does not care whether the target is a nuclear weapons state or not.
					
					The DPRK was singled out as the first target. 
					
					The DPRK counteracts the U.S. pressure with legitimacy. 
					
					The U.S. is wholly responsible for the situation. The U.S. does not want peace. 
					
					It is the chieftain which introduced nukes into the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					The DPRK pulled out of the NPT and had access to nuclear weapons to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat. 
					
					During the Korean War the U.S. used extremely monstrous ways and turned Korea into ashes. 
					
					The DPRK was convinced that the best way of defending its security from the U.S. aggression is to have nuclear deterrence. 
					
					The commentary stressed it will be irresponsible if one fails to defend the security of one's own people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un atiende varias cuestiones del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un atiende varias cuestiones del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el dia 24 las labores de varias ramas del EPC.
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Kyong Ok y Ryom Chol Song.
					
					Ante todo, el Mariscal vio los instrumentos culturales hechos en el EPC.
					
					Para evaluar la calidad de acordeon, guitarra, janggo (tambor coreano), tambor, piano y otros instrumentos, hizo tocarlos a los artistas profesionales y escucho la opinion de estos.
					
					Dijo que el EPC debe fabricar mayor cantidad de instrumentos musicales de buena calidad y enviarlos a los uniformados para que estos puedan pasar el servicio militar siempre con optimismo y jubilo.
					
					A continuacion, paso revista a los vestigios, datos y maquetas a ser exhibidos en el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Aprecio la restauracion excelente de las fotos del Presidente Kim Il Sung en el tiempo de la pasada guerra coreana (1950-1953).
					
					Viendo uno por uno los vestigios y datos como manuscritos del Presidente escritos durante la guerra, resalto la necesidad de profundizar las labores de descubrimiento mediante la comprobacion segun el principio historicista.
					
					Seguidamente, el Mariscal vio las muestras de nuevos abrigos que se distribuiran a los alumnos de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y la Escuela Revolucionaria   Kang Pan Sok.
					
					Pregunto a los alumnos modelos cual tipo les gustaba mas y les convendria mas si se pone la piel al cuello de abrigo en el invierno.
					
					Escucho sonriente la respuesta de los alumnos de que les gustaba mas el abrigo de cuello cruzado y dio la tarea de hacer los abrigos segun la demanda de ellos y de enmendar el reglamento de ropaje.
					
					No hay nada que escatimar para los alumnos de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae, fidedignos sucesores de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y futuros pilares de nuestra revolucion, dijo y propuso darles todo lo mejor del mundo.
					
					Al final, el Mariscal presencio la funcion de ensayo de musicas y danzas "Alcanzaremos la victoria final con el fusil del monte Paektu" que prepara el Conjunto Artistico del EPC.
					
					En la ocasion se presentaron diversas piezas, entre otras, el coro mixto "Alcanzaremos la victoria bajo la bandera del Comandante Supremo", "La fuerza de Corea", la danza "Nuestro fusil", el duo y coro mixtos "Flamea alto, bandera de nuestro Partido", la cancion acompanada con kayagum (instrumento musical coreano) y pangchang masculino "Nuestro satelite vuela en el cielo", la ejecucion de acordeon y Tap "Anochecer en la base naval", el coro mixto y Tap "Avance" y el coro mixto "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un".
					
					Terminada la funcion, dio instrucciones que serviran de guia en la creacion artistica del conjunto.
					
					El partido deposita gran esperanza en el Conjunto Artistico del EPC, dijo y expuso la conviccion de que los funcionarios, creadores y artistas de esa banda uniran las fuerzas para dinamizar las actividades de creacion y funcion y llamar asi al pueblo al cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 1501 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 1501 de EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono el dia 24 la unidad 1501 del EPC.
					El Comandante Supremo expuso gran satisfaccion de que la unidad haya logrado grandes exitos en materializar cabalmente las instrucciones dadas en el terreno por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Paso revista a los equipos tecnicos de combate de punta elaborados por la unidad con sus propias fuerzas.
					
					Informado detalladamente de la funcion de los equipos y el estado de su introduccion, el Comandante Supremo no oculto la alegria de que los oficiales y soldados de la unidad hayan fabricado modernos equipos muy necesarios a los preparativos de combate dedicando la inteligencia y pasion.
					
					Luego de escuchar las explicaciones del comandante de la unidad sobre los equipos, los acaricio durante largo tiempo y dijo con amplia sonrisa que son magnificos tanto el aspecto como la funcion.
					
					Dijo que los equipos fueron elaborados muy convenientes al combate real y le parecia ver sus figuras que avanzan vigorosamente hacia adelante aniquilando a los enemigos. 
					
					Enfatizo que le gusta mas que nada el hecho de que los equipos desarrollados por la unidad son ligeros y poseen la alta velocidad y las funciones intelectuales.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho de que se hayan introducido varias invenciones que posibilitan poner de pleno manifiesto el funcionamiento de los equipos en cualesquier situaciones dificiles.
					
					Aprecio el prometedor modo de lucha de los funcionarios de la unidad que apoyan con sus practicas la idea del partido de conquistar la tecnologia de punta.
					
					Hizo funcionar esos armamentos en el campo de entrenamiento y presento los planes de tacticas operacionales ingeniosas y diestras que permiten eliminar de un salto a los enemigos usando estos armamentos.
					
					Paso revista a los equipos de juego convenientes al parque, aprecio de alto el que los uniformados de la unidad hayan hecho buenas cosas para los ninos.
					
					Reitero su evaluacion de que los oficiales y soldados de la unidad cumplen con responsabilidad sus deberes manteniendose en alta vigilancia sobre las tentativas de agresion de los enemigos y manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que cumpliran la obligacion y el papel de vanguardia en apoyar la politica de Songun del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un averigua estado de construccion de barco restaurante Taedonggang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un averigua estado de construccion de barco restaurante Taedonggang
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el dia 24 el barco restaurante Taedonggang en plena construccion por el EPC.
					Este barco con desplazamiento de 820 toneladas tiene 68.98 metros de largo y 26 de ancho y esta compuesto de dos pisos dotados de varios cuartos de comida y la sala de banquete con capacidad de 300 huespedes.
					
					Al recorrer el exterior e interior del barco, el Comandante Supremo manifesto gran satisfaccion de que los uniformados estan construyendo en un corto plazo el moderno barco restaurante en acato a la politica de amor por el pueblo del PTC.
					
					Viendo atentamente la cubierta del barco y  la barandilla colocada alli, cercioro minuciosamente si no hay incomodidad para los huespedes al disfrutar el paisaje.
					
					Pregunto sobre los materiales usados en instalar la cubierta y senalo que hay que construirla bien en el principio de asegurar las demandas higienicas porque el barco sirve para restaurante.
					
					Al pasar revista a los cuartos de comida, apunto que puesto que se eleva la calidad de la arquitectura segun los materiales finales, hay que utilizar mejores materiales en la construccion del barco en cuestion.
					
					Se entero donde se elaboran los muebles a ser instalados en el barco y destaco la necesidad de colocar los muebles comodos y vistosos para los huespedes.
					
					Asevero que hay que poner atencion en la ventilacion y aireacion de los cuartos de comida.
					
					Si se construye el barco, lo visitaran muchos habitantes, recalco y acentuo la necesidad de hacer preparativos desde ahora para la gestion excelente.
					
					Acoto que fue el proposito del Dirigente Kim Jong Il construir un moderno barco restaurante para el pueblo en el rio Taedong, orgullo de Pyongyang, y anadio que si el barco se pone en  funcion, se vera mas hermoso y peculiar el aspecto de la capital.
					
					Al final, el Mariscal dio las tareas combativas de terminar a toda costa la obra hasta el significado Dia del Sol.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente encargado de Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente encargado de Bangladesh
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 24 un mensaje de felicitacion a Abdul Hamid, presidente encargado de la Republica Popular de Bangladesh, con motivo del 42o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais.
					El su misiva, el remitente deseo mayores exitos en las labores por la prosperidad del pais y manifesto su conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran las relaciones de amistad entre la RPDC y Bangladesh en varios dominios.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam desea bienestar y prosperidad al pueblo griego
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam desea bienestar y prosperidad al pueblo griego
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 25 un mensaje de felicitacion a Carlos Papoulias, presidente de la Republica de Grecia, con motivo del dia nacional del pais europeo.

articles.title: No se puede impedir veracidad de posesion de armas nucleares autodefensivas, apunta ACNC
articles.content:
No se puede impedir veracidad de posesion de armas nucleares autodefensivas, apunta ACNC
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, Estados Unidos se aferra a todos los fraudes para tergiversar la esencia del estado actual de la Peninsula Coreana.
					Difunde el rumor de que los ejercicios de guerra librados junto con el ejercito titere surcoreano y otros satelites y los medios de guerra nuclear son para detener el empeoramiento de la situacion de esta Peninsula creada por la "provocacion de misil nuclear del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					Ademas, las autoridades norteamericanas de alto rango hablan tanto de que el "desarrollo de misil nuclear del Norte es la accion erronea", "si este opta el otro camino, es posible hacer negociaciones sinceras".
					
					Todo esto es el sofisma para justificar su politica hostil anti-RPDC, imputar a esta la responsabilidad de la situacion dada e intensificar el ambiente de presion y sancion anti-RPDC.
					
					Ya hemos subrayado, el arma nuclear de la RPDC es el justo remedio omnipotente para defender la soberania y la seguridad del pais. La RPDC la ha poseido partiendo de la leccion de la historia de enfrentamiento con EE.UU.
					
					Tomar la posicion hegemonica en la region de Asia-Pacifico ocupando la Peninsula Coreana, punto importante politico, militar y geografico de esta region, y realizar la ambicion de dominio al mundo es la invariable politica de EE.UU.
					
					Para este fin, durante casi 70 anos desde cuando ocupo ilegalmente en septiembre de 1945 el territorio surcoreano, el imperio considero la RPDC que esta en el frente avanzado del antiimperialismo, la paz y el socialismo como una espina en los ojos y perpetro tenazmente las maquinaciones de aplastamiento anti-RPDC.
					
					En su politica de aplastamiento anti-RPDC tomo como medio principal las armas nucleares.
					
					En el pasado, EE.UU. ha venido persiguiendo invariablemente la politica anti-RPDC basada en las armas nucleares aunque esta en el enfrentamiento o el dialogo con ella.
					
					El permanente chantaje nuclear y la politica de guerra de EE.UU., le obligaron a la RPDC tomar la decision final de tener el poderoso disuasivo nuclear, medio fisico para defender la soberania del pais y los maximos intereses de la nacion.
					
					Hoy dia, las fuerzas nucleares de la RPDC sirven de los medios de justa guerra para acabar eternamente con la obstinada politica hostil anti-RPDC y el peligro de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Mientras continue la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y exista en la Tierra los bastiones de agresion a Corea, no cambiara la opcion de la RPDC.
					
					Es tan ridiculo hablar del reconocimiento de alguien la posesion de armas nucleares por el ejercicio de nuestra digna soberania y medidas autodefensivas.
					
					Regatear las armas nucleares de la RPDC como objeto de cambio para el beneficio economico y como premisa del dialogo parte del pensamiento en que el dinero es omnipotente.
					
					EE.UU. debe saber bien que con el sofisma y la tentacion no puede castrar la veracidad de la posesion de nucleo autodefensivo de la RPDC ni discutir su abandonamiento unilateral.
					
					La RPDC no tiene voluntad de hacer dialogo con EE.UU. que persigue su politica de chantaje nuclear y avanzara sin vacilacion hacia el optado camino del Songun.
